STEP 3 - Get PTZ configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

STEP 5 - Get PTZ configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

Test.Name: Wrong response: no node token
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONFIGURATION test when DUT return correct response.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-2-1-2 PTZ CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get PTZ configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validating GetConfigurations response STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Get PTZ configuration Transmit done Receive done The element 'PTZConfiguration' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl' has invalid child element 'DefaultAbsolutePantTiltPositionSpace' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema'. List of possible elements expected: 'NodeToken' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema'. STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
